headline: Marmee, Minus the Sugarcoating
abstract: In early screen adaptations, the character was so wan, one actress wondered why she was even there. Recent adaptations have looked at the pivotal figure in terms of how society values women.
lead_paragraph: Fans of Greta Gerwig’s “Little Women” can’t stopping talking about it: Marmee March’s confession to her headstrong daughter Jo that “I’m angry nearly every day of my life.”
